content.rendered:
SOCIAL MEDIA MARKETING EXETER

Social Posting & Advertising Services

Book a call

We provide engaging content and social media marketing in Exeter, that will get you noticed and grow your business organically. Using a combination of informative posts, Facebook advertisement, and audience optimisation, we can help increase your followers, generate more leads, and increase sales conversion rates. 

No matter your objectives, we will work with you to formulate a social media strategy that gets results. We also create unique and original content and copy, so that your social media footprint is authentic and fresh. Working on platforms, including Facebook, Instagram, and Linked In, we also produce creative that resonates with your audience. So, get your business noticed and inspire conversation! 

Call us today for a no-obligation consultation and a quotation.

Award Winning Social Media Agency

Social Media Management

Looking for a local web designer? We are based in Exeter, Devon but provide services to clients across the world! We have worked with local clients here in the city, neighbouring areas including Plymouth, Torbay, and Barnstaple and further afield including London, the Midlands, and Liverpool. We have even worked with clients in New Zealand, Canada, and America! While you will find our work far and wide, we never loose touch of our roots and strive to offer a personal ‘local web designer’ experience, no matter where you are based!
talk to us about social media

Other Social Media Services

Our other social media growth and paids social ads services include:

  • Facebook posts
  • Facebook advertising
  • Instagram posts
  • Engagement campaigns
  • Follower campaigns
  • Sales campaigns
  • Competitor reviews
  • Content creation
  • Copywriting
  • Strategy advice
  • Scheduling
  • Optimising
  • Reporting

Instagram & Facebook Ads Management Exeter

Thanks to improved algorithms, boosting your posts on Facebook is no longer enough to get seen by the right people. Facebook advertisement is a better investment in your time and your budget if you want to start seeing a ROI in your social outreach. We are experienced in using FB advertising to its full potential, including enhanced targeting tools and insights, so that you don’t have to waste resources. Not to mention, you get to decide how much to invest. The more you put in the more you get out, so we will offer expert advice on where your budget would be best spent. We can offer Facebook Ad management independently, as well as part of a larger social media management package. Contact us for more information and a commitment free discussion.

Speak with Facebook ads experts

3 steps to a successful social media

We are so passionate about our clients websites. With over 10 years experience, we do what we do best and create a fully custom website that is on brand and designed to help you reach your goals. 

1

Schedule a Call

Whether your social media looks good or bad, if it is not generating you customers, then schedule a call with a web design expert.

2

Custom Social Strategy

During the call, share with us your goals, we want to know about you so we can give you an outline to a strategy that will work for you.

3

Better Social Presence

Once your potential customers start landing on your social channel, your posts will be designed to engage them and take action.
Book a call with Exeter Social Media Experts

Social Media manager near me

Ready to take you social media to the next level?

For social media marketing in Exeter, call our experienced passionate social media marketing team .

FAQs

Frequently Asked Questions about Social Media

Book a Social Media Consultation
How much does social media managementcost?

Every social media client managed by Parker Digital has a custom strategy designed to help you meet your goals. Pricing will vary depending on the quantity of posts required each month and the amount of platforms you want managed.  However, we provide honest pricing, always keep our rates competitive and are happy to tailor packages to fit your budget. As a starting point Social Media Managament from Parker Digital starts at £495 per month.

Do I Need A Social Media Manager?

If you post infrequently or don’t use social media for business growth, then you may be happy to manage your activity yourself. However, If you want to stay current, post regularly on multiple channels and produce regular engaging, original content, then a social media manager can alleviate the strain and free up your valuable time. Not to mention, an experience social media manager Is likely to get you results quicker and more effectively, thus saving you money and improving your ROI.

How Much Is Facebook Advertisement?

Advertising on Facebook is as costly as you choose to make it, you can invest as much or as little as you wish. Facebook Ad management will be charged on a monthly retainer, which will be calculated based on the frequency and volume of posts required. We can provide an accurate quotation, free of charge, upon request.

Why hire a professional web designer?

Amateur web design may look acceptable on the surface, but sites are often riddled with broken links, load slowly, and are likely to look terrible on smaller screens. This can be far more costly than hiring a web designer as your potential customers may look elsewhere for a better experience. User experience and conversion are tightly linked, and we offer affordable designs that will ensure your visitors stick around.

Will You Post on My Instagram?

Yes, if you wish to post on Instagram, we can also manage this for you too.

Boosted Posts VS Facebook Ads – What’s the Difference?

A boosted post is simply paying to have more people view your post, no matter whether these people are interested in your offering or not. There is very little control or targeting options available and can often be ‘dead money’. Meanwhile, Facebook advertisement gives you control and allows you to tailor the audience perimeters. Therefore, the people that see your advert will be the people who are most likely to use/buy/benefit from it. Thus, increasing interaction and generating genuine interest, resulting in a much better ROI.

"Parker Digital Marketing is a brilliant, results orientated digital marketing company who listened carefully to my business plans and strategy to sell my online course. They are very focused on producing the best marketing campaigns that we know for sure perform realistically well in the marketplace. Our strategy has evolved from strength to strength and saw results come in as we split tested our Facebook ads. I could not have reached any success with selling my online course if it wasn’t for PDM.”
Arshan
The Wiser Course
